name: Garden Trouble
description:
Done in Game Dev Network 2021.

You are a gardener who is trying to get out of the forest which is infested with zombie weed. You need to bring water to the sunflower gates and wait over the night for it to open. Defend yourself from the zombie weeds with your trusty sickle. But be cautious every weed you kill will respawn again next day.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Shoot: LMB

Pause: Esc

Credits:

kovalok: Sprites, music, sound effects, coding

Maevie: coding
